body:
This issue will track the tasks needed to prepare the infrastructure we'll need to support automated testing and provisioning of source and binary packages.

- [x] Acquire AWS account credentials
- [x] Setup spending alerts
- [x] Review Kubernetes setup documentation at https://kubernetes.io/docs/setup
- [x] Develop an initial EC2 host allocation based on installation requirements.
- [x] Deploy a minimal EC2 host allocation for development and testing.
- [x] Develop provisioning scripts and tools to automate the cluster setup process.
- [x] Deploy production allocation using developed scripts.
- [ ] Develop a retention policy for source packages.
- [ ] Develop a retention policy for binary packages.
- [ ] ? @tgamblin @scheibelp (setup build bot?)

The following issues should be considered blocked on this work:
#7121
#7123
#7116
#7117
title: Deploy a kubernetes cluster on AWS.
